thread.title: Marisa Hipperson
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Deutschland bewertet von Marisa Hipperson

author: Marisa Hipperson
title: Marisa Hipperson
text: The order I placed was not delivered. Neither myself nor the recipient received communication to advise why this was or to advise a delivery date/time. I find this highly unacceptable, I will not be using your services again.
